text:
int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] , i , j ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; int count = 0 , pi = - 1 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) { if ( pi == - 1 ) pi = i ; continue ; } else { printf ( "%d %d
" , pi , i ) ; int numOf = i - pi ; count += ( numOf * ( numOf + 1 ) ) / 2 ; pi = - 1 ; } } if ( pi != - 1 ) { printf ( "%d %d
" , pi , i ) ; int numOf = i - pi ; count += ( numOf * ( numOf + 1 ) ) / 2 ; pi = - 1 ; } printf ( "%d
" , count + n ) ; } }
